title: Schoolhouse Rock - Grammar Rock
description:
Schoolhouse Rock is probably the most popular and useful educational video series, ever.

In this case, we have Grammar Rock, music videos about each major part of speech...somehow each made more fun than even the most pointless kid's cartoon.

Face it, you learned more about certain things from Schoolhouse Rock than you ever did from public school...and now your kids can, too!

Music by Bob Dorough, Grady Tate, Blossom Dearie, Lynn Ahrens, Jack Sheldon, and others. 

video codec: MPEG-2
height: 480
width: 480

Grammar Rock
Unpack Your Adjectives     - adjective   - George R. Newall, Blossom Dearie - 1975 
Lolly, Lolly, Lolly, Get Your Adverbs Here - adverb - Bob Dorough - 1974 
Conjunction Junction       - conjunction - Jack Sheldon and Terry Morel - 1974 
Interjections!             - interjection - Lynn Ahrens, Essra Mohawk - 1974 
Rufus Xavier Sarsaparilla  - pronoun     - Kathy Mandary, Jack Sheldon - 1977 
Verb: That's What's Happening  - verb        - Zachary Sanders - 1974 
A Noun Is A Person, Place Or Thing - noun        - Lynn Ahrens - 1973 
Busy Prepositions          - preposition - Jack Sheldon and Bob Dorough October 24, - 1993 
The Tale of Mr. Morton     - subject and predicate - Lynn Ahrens, Jack Sheldon - 1993
